# Isolated Lending with Shared Liquidity
Earn AI-optimized yields, powered by Sturdy's Bittensor subnet.
[enter app](https://sturdy.finance/<https:/v2.sturdy.finance/>)
![Sturdy](https://sturdy.finance/grid.svg)
![Sturdy Partnership](https://sturdy.finance/rail.svg)![Sturdy Partnership](https://sturdy.finance/partners_1.png)![Sturdy Partnership](https://sturdy.finance/partners_10.png)![Sturdy Partnership](https://sturdy.finance/partners_2.png)![Sturdy Partnership](https://sturdy.finance/partners_11.png)![Sturdy Partnership](https://sturdy.finance/partners_3.png)![Sturdy Partnership](https://sturdy.finance/partners_12.png)![Sturdy Partnership](https://sturdy.finance/partners_4.png)![Sturdy Partnership](https://sturdy.finance/partners_13.png)![Sturdy Partnership](https://sturdy.finance/partners_5.png)![Sturdy Partnership](https://sturdy.finance/partners_14.png)![Sturdy Partnership](https://sturdy.finance/partners_6.png)![Sturdy Partnership](https://sturdy.finance/partners_15.png)![Sturdy Partnership](https://sturdy.finance/partners_7.png)![Sturdy Partnership](https://sturdy.finance/partners_16.png)![Sturdy Partnership](https://sturdy.finance/partners_8.png)![Sturdy Partnership](https://sturdy.finance/partners_17.png)![Sturdy Partnership](https://sturdy.finance/partners_9.png)![Sturdy Partnership](https://sturdy.finance/partners_18.png)
core mechanics
## how it works
Built on top are aggregators, Yearn V3 yield optimizers that distribute deposits across whitelisted silos, enabling lenders to select which collateral assets can be used as collateral against their deposits.On the backend, Sturdy's Bittensor subnet provides aggregators with allocations generated by Bittensor miners to autonomously optimize yields.
[learn more](https://sturdy.finance/<https:/medium.com/@sturdyfinance/introducing-sturdy-v2-4a0135aca675>)
![Sturdy](https://sturdy.finance/hierarchy.svg)
benefits
## sturdy unifies liquidity
Isolated risk doesn’t have to mean isolated liquidity! Thanks to Sturdy’s novel architecture, users don’t have to choose between permissionlessness and deep liquidity.
[![Sturdy](https://sturdy.finance/_next/static/media/feature1.a5a8164c.svg)for lendersTake risk management into your own hands and choose exactly which collateral assets you're exposed to.lend now](https://sturdy.finance/<https:/v2.sturdy.finance/>)[![Sturdy](https://sturdy.finance/_next/static/media/feature2.d7c54b87.svg)for borrowersBorrow against any asset you want with Sturdy's permissionless asset onboarding.lend now](https://sturdy.finance/<https:/v2.sturdy.finance/>)[![Sturdy](https://sturdy.finance/_next/static/media/feature3.e032711a.svg)For Project TeamsCreate liquid money markets for your tokens in hours, not months.lend now](https://sturdy.finance/<https:/v2.sturdy.finance/>)
![Sturdy](https://sturdy.finance/bg.png)
![Sturdy](https://sturdy.finance/bg_s.png)
investors

Review the codebase for a better understanding of how your favorite lending protocol operates!](https://sturdy.finance/<https:/github.com/sturdyfi>)
![Sturdy](https://sturdy.finance/hero.png)
Sturdy enables anyone to create a liquid money market for any token. Sturdy uses a novel two-tier architecture to isolate risk between assets while avoiding liquidity fragmentation. The base layer consists of risk-isolated pools; aggregation built on top enables lenders to select which collateral assets can be used as collateral for their deposits.
© 2024 Sturdy. All rights reserved.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Sturdy**

Founded in 2020 and hailing from Y Combinator's W21 batch, Sturdy is an innovative player in the decentralized finance (DeFi) arena, designed to facilitate permissionless lending. Based on a cutting-edge protocol, Sturdy aims to create efficient and accessible lending markets for everyone.

**Mission**  
Sturdy's mission is straightforward: to provide a DeFi protocol that enables permissionless lending. This allows users to lend and borrow without the traditional barriers found in centralized finance systems.

**Team and Location**  
While the specific physical location is not disclosed, Sturdy operates with a dedicated team of 11 employees. 

**Key Features**  
Sturdy uniquely combines isolated risk pools with shared liquidity. This two-tier architecture allows lenders to choose which collateral assets can be used against deposits, promoting both customization and liquidity. Its platform utilizes advanced algorithms, powered by Sturdy's Bittensor subnet, to optimize yields for users.

**Current Offerings**  
You can explore various features on their website, including:
- **Isolated Lending with Shared Liquidity**: Earn AI-optimized yields.
- **User Empowerment**: Lenders manage their risk by selecting collateral.
- **Permissionless Asset Onboarding**: Borrowers can use any token as collateral.

**Investors and Partnerships**  
Sturdy has attracted strong backing, including investments from notable firms like SoftBank, Pantera Capital, and Y Combinator itself. The company's partnership ecosystem is robust, further enhancing its credibility in the DeFi space.

**Security and Audits**  
To ensure their platform is secure, Sturdy has undergone thorough audits by firms like Spearbit and ChainSecurity. They also run a bug bounty program to encourage community participation in identifying vulnerabilities.

**Get Involved**  
Sturdy welcomes users, developers, and community enthusiasts to engage via their various social channels:
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/SturdyFinance)
- [Discord](https://discord.gg/tRVHp6Vx5N)
- [GitHub](https://github.com/sturdyfi)

**Conclusion**  
In the ever-evolving world of DeFi, Sturdy stands out for its commitment to permissionless lending and innovative liquidity solutions. If you're interested in exploring an accessible platform that combines security with flexibility, Sturdy might just be what you’re looking for.

For more information, visit their official site at [sturdy.finance](https://sturdy.finance).
